Icarus Group Ironwork

  • Icarus Group Ironwork is a full service custom metal working, fabrication and welding services company.
  • Icarus Group Ironworks Inc. provides design, engineering and manufacturing of industrial and architectural details and related metalwork services.
  • We are expert fabricators of iron and steel components, architectural elements, stairway systems and railings, gates, fencing, and any residential and commercial metal structures.

Icarus Group Ironwork offers a full range of ornamental metal work capabilities.

Icarus Group Ironwork creates structural and ornamental metalwork for residential homes, apartments, stores and other commercial properties, office buildings, public spaces and government buildings.

Our skilled craftsmen can fabricate and weld just about anything from iron, bronze or steel. Icarus Group Ironwork products are custom built with impeccable craftsmanship and professionally installed.


Icarus Group Ironwork serves a wide range of metropolitan New York City and national clients, including industrial, institutional, commercial and residential clientele.

We specialize in iron fencing, drive and garden gates, exterior and interior walkway railings, rolling-gate installations, standard and spiral staircases, as well as decorative and ornamental ironwork, contemporary and custom fabrication.

Our mission is to provide top-quality workmanship always.
You will always find us to be on time, ready to go.

No job is too big or too small We urge you to take advantage of our always FREE ESTIMATES!
